item.title: Man jailed for 10 years after chainsaw murder attempt on police officer
item.description: Albanian national Liridon Kastrati described the judge as a "terrorist" when the sentence was passed.

item.title: Northern Lights illuminate UK skies in hues of pink and green
item.description: The phenomenon known as the Aurora Borealis is the result of solar eruptions sending particles that interact with the Earth's atmosphere.

item.title: Chris Mason: Trump's Chagos dig poses massive strategic question for Starmer
item.description: The prime minister has built his foreign policy around being seen as a trustworthy ally of the US president.

item.title: Spain train crash recovery continues as investigators probe 'gap' in rail
item.description: Authorities say the twisted train wreckage makes it difficult to recover people trapped inside.

item.title: France makes first interception targeting small boat crossings to UK
item.description: The operation follows a change of tactics agreed amid growing pressure from the UK government to step up interventions.
